description:
Did you ever want to start your own eCommerce business but did not know where to start? Are you looking for the most efficient and quickest way to set up a successful online store? 

I have a solution for you.

I have adapted the Minimum Viable Product methodology from Lean Startup by Eric Ries to eCommerce.

Build your eCommerce business in just two weeks. In this course you will learn how to quickly build an online store, get your first sales and optimize your business based on your first results. 

I designed this course for someone who wants to start an eCommerce business, which performs and brings results. By the end of the course you will be able to set up an online store and apply the MVP methodology Of BUILD - MEASURE - LEARN.

You will learn how to use your time effectively and build something people will love. 

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

Why you should enroll

  • Course includes over 3 hours of high quality content, including links to key resources and insight tips I have acquired in the last 8 years of building and managing eCommerce businesses
  • You'll learn skills that will allow you to set up your online store and by applying the MVP technology be successful at it from the first try.
  • You'll have direct access to the instructor to ask any questions you might have and get direct feedback. 

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

About the instructor:

Top rated Udemy Instructor with 5 star reviews.

Teaches different courses on Entrepreneurship, with over 3,000 students enrolled.

+ Worked in Online Gaming Industry and Venture Capital

+ Founded 5 companies in the last 8 years
title: MVP in eCommerce: Build an Online Store Customers Will Love
